attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the Prime Minister to elect a CPS Ombudsman in alignment with other Government Departments.
I for one of many, have been failed by the CPS. Even with police recommendations,after a 20 month long thorough and precise investigation, which cited a prosecution against two social workers for Perjury and Perverting the course of Justice.  Because of these people` actions I lost my 10 week old baby for 6 months and my 6 yr old child forever.
Here in N Ireland we have a Police Ombudsman, which generates great "Public confidence".
A CPS Ombudsman, I`m sure, would also be beneficial, not alone for the public but also for the police in general.     

     

It is a very simple measure and would generate great Public confidence in the Justice system.
